Constructor Detail

ImageFile

public ImageFile( std::string filePath, int frame_count, int col_count, int w, int h );
Constructor to set the class data to the specified values.
Parameters:
file - The file path for the bitmap file associated with the object.
frame_count - The number of frames of animation in the file.
col_count - The number of columns of frames in the file.
w - The width of a single animation frame.
h - The height of a single animation frame.

ImageFile

public ImageFile();
Default Constructor

~ImageFile

public ~ImageFile();
Default Destructor. memory is released.

Method Detail

GetFrame

public BITMAP* GetFrame( int frameNum, int width, int height );
for the specified frame from the associated bitmap file.
Parameters:
frameNum - The index for the frame to be copied.
width - The desired width of the returned BITMAP.
height - The desired height of the returned BITMAP. that is the desired from of size width x height.

Gets the height of one frame of animation in the associated file.

The height of one frame of animation in the associated file.

isValid

public bool isValid();
Gets whether or not the associated bitmap file has been loaded.
Returns:
true if the file has been loaded successfully, false otherwise.
